original_text: he entered once for all into the holy places, not by means of the blood of goats and calves but by means of his own blood, thus securing an eternal redemption.
korean_text: 염소와 송아지의 피로 하지 아니하고 오직 자기의 피로 영원한 속죄를 이루사 단번에 성소에 들어가셨느니라

sentences.original_text: he entered once for all into the holy places
not by means of the blood of goats and calves
but by means of his own blood
